src/features/globe/components/ScoutPanel.description: 2010-line component containing: COUNTRY_NAMES (100+ entries), CATEGORY_ICONS, CATEGORY_COLORS, and 9 inline sub-components (CategoryUpgradeModal, CountrySection, OverallCountrySection, LocationCard, RankedLocationCard, OverallLocationCard, BlurredOverallCard, BlurredRankedCard, SignUpPromptCard)
New directory structure created following CityInfoPanel pattern: index.tsx re-exports from original ScoutPanel.tsx for backward compatibility during incremental refactoring
